scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen-exercises/Exercises/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../../fullstackopen-exercises/Exercises/part3/backend/ && cp -r ../../../../fullstackopen-exercises/Exercises/part3/backend/build ../../../../fso-part3-exercise/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
